title: Recipe
descreiption: A recipe is a set of ingredients and a result that can be crafted using a crafting table, furnace, brewing stand, or stonecutter.

format_version.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.
format_version.title: Format Version

data.title: Data
data.description: The data of the item to unlock

context.title: Context
context.description: The context of the achievement to unlock

A.description: Represents a furnace recipe for a furnace.'Input` items will burn and transform into items specified in `output`..
A.title: Furnace Recipe

input.description: Items used as input for the furnace recipe.
input.title: Input

output.description: Items used as output for the furnace recipe.
output.title: Output

E.description: Represents a Potion Brewing Container Recipe..
E.title: Brewing Recipe 1.12.0

input.description: Input potion used on the brewing stand.
input.title: Input

output.description: Output potion from mixing the input potion with the reagent on the brewing stand.
output.title: Output

reagent.description: Item used to mix with the input potion.
reagent.title: Reagent

F.description: Represents a Potion Brewing Container Recipe..
F.title: Brewing Recipe 1.12.0

input.description: Input potion used on the brewing stand.
input.title: Input

output.description: Output potion from mixing the input potion with the reagent on the brewing stand.
output.title: Output

reagent.description: Item used to mix with the input potion.
reagent.title: Reagent

G.description: Represents a shaped crafting recipe for a crafting table. The key used in the pattern may be any single character except the `space` character, which is reserved for empty slots in a recipe..
G.title: Shaped Recipe

key.description: Patten key character mapped to item names.
key.title: Key

pattern.description: Characters that represent a pattern to be defined by keys.
pattern.title: Pattern

priority.description: Item used as output for the furnace recipe.
priority.title: Priority

result.description: When input items match the pattern then these items are the result.
result.title: Result

assume_symmetry.title: Assume Symmetry
assume_symmetry.description: Used to automatically assume a symmetrical recipe should return the same resultUsed to automatically assume a symmetrical recipe should return the same result

ingredients.description: Items used as input (without a shape) for the recipe.
ingredients.title: Ingredients

priority.description: Item used as output for the furnace recipe.
priority.title: Priority

result.description: When input items match the pattern then these items are the result.
result.title: Result

J.description: Represents a smithing table crafting recipe..
J.title: Smithing Transform Recipe 1.12.0

base.description: Item used as base for the smithing recipe.
base.title: Base

addition.description: Item used as addition for the smithing recipe.
addition.title: Addition

result.description: When input items match the pattern then these items are the result.
result.title: Result
